title: Crystal clear
brief_description: Traces in detail the making of sugar from the planting and cultivating of the sugar cane to harvesting, the milling process, storage and shipping, the refining process and the distribution of refined sugar products. Most of the commentary in this film is given by people who actually work in the sugar industry. Suitable for secondary level.
